Package boofcv.examples.segmentation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExampleSegmentColor
    Example which demonstrates how color can be used to segment an image.
    ExampleSegmentSuperpixels
    Example demonstrating high level image segmentation interface.
    ExampleThresholding
    Demonstration of different techniques for automatic thresholding an image to create a binary image.
    ExampleWatershedWithSeeds
    Watershed image segmentation will often produce an excessive number of regions since each local minimum is the seed which creates a new region.
